channel.title: [508] NPC drops error;
channel.description:
i'm getting an error while adding this, Any help will be appreciated. [code].\palidino76s2
pcs\NPC.java:130: cannot find symbol symbol : class Player location: class palidino76.rs2.npcs.NPC public void npcDied(Player p, int npcID, int abSX, int abSY) { ^ .\palidino76s2
pcs\NPC.java:133: cannot find symbol symbol : class PlayerItems location: class palidino76.rs2.npcs.NPC PlayerItems pi = new PlayerItems(); ^ .\palidino76s2
pcs\NPC.java:133: cannot find symbol symbol : class PlayerItems location: class palidino76.rs2.npcs.NPC PlayerItems pi = new PlayerItems(); ^ .\palidino76s2
pcs\NPC.java:151: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Misc location: class palidino76.rs2.npcs.NPC
if (Misc.random(3) == 1) {
^ 4 errors[/code]

location: class palidino76.rs2.npcs.NPC

if (misc.random(3) == 1) {

item.title: [508] NPC drops error;
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

.\palidino76\rs2\npcs\NPC.java:130: cannot find symbol symbol : class Player location: class palidino76.rs2.npcs.NPC public void npcDied(Player p, int npcID, int abSX, int abSY) { ^ .\palidino76\rs2\npcs\NPC.java:133: cannot find symbol symbol : class PlayerItems location: class palidino76.rs2.npcs.NPC PlayerItems pi = new PlayerItems(); ^ .\palidino76\rs2\npcs\NPC.java:133: cannot find symbol symbol : class PlayerItems location: class palidino76.rs2.npcs.NPC PlayerItems pi = new PlayerItems(); ^
Try making the P in PlayerItems and Player lowercase.

playerItems player

And the Misc should be,

misc

Read full topic
